page.title: Introduction to Example Lesson
page.text: In this lesson we learn letters i and j.
Press 2,4 for i and and 2,4,5 for j.
PRESS SPACE TO START THE LESSON!
page.prac: i i i i j j j j ii jj iijj jjii dij dij adj adj cci cjj bbjj bad cad big gag badge badge fig giff jjf ffij abcd efgh ij ij ji ji
